title: Champion shard can't upgrade?
body:
So, I have 1401 blue essence and I'm trying to upgrade a Tristana shard to a permanent (which I hope is owning her?) but it wont let me. It does nothing at all. says -285 essence beside the option which is way less than what I have but doesn't seem to work. Any clues as to whats up?

Thanks!

replies.body: I looked into this for you and I do see you have plenty of blue essence and a Tristana Shard.  Fusing them should unlock her for you!  Have you restarted your client incase of a connection or sync issue?  If so, show me a screenshot of what's going on.  It's really strange that nothing is happening, and I'd like to take a closer look.  As far as I can see, you should be good to go.

lol the good old, "Have you tried turning it off and on again," did the trick (as it does in 98% of cases), but it was odd. I didn't even see the fuse screen. I sold my Illaoi{{champion:420}} thinking that -285 means I need 285 more essence since nothing else seemed to be working. >< Is it possible to undo that? :O :/

Having the same issue with a Camille Champ Shard. I have 1267 blue essence but I am not even given the option to upgrade it into a champ. Restarted the client 3 times a well.

Thanks for any help you may have!
My account have this bug i have my elise in Loot but i cant upgrade i have 990 essense and i cant upgrade pls help me

Having the same issue.  
I own all of the champs, I have enough BE, I have 2 Mastery 6 tokens, but I can't upgrade Taric to a permanent for 810 BE so I can take him to Mastery 6.
